pageContext.html:
Hackvent 2015

by sudhackar

This subdirectory contains some scripts I wrote for a particular day of the month for hackvent 2015. Overall it was a great CTF. I ended up at #26 in 1000+ players.

  • 14 Dec : Simple .NET decompiling
  • 18 Dec : Mach-O 64-bit x86_64 executable
  • 19 Dec : Simple SOAP
  • 23 Dec : Format String Exploitation
